entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain or drizzle and ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow late in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
